meanings.definition: A piece of material being worked on
meanings.sent1: The carpenter carefully sanded the workpieces to make them smooth.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted beautiful designs on the workpieces.
meanings.sent3: The workpieces decided to rebel and hide from the craftsman.
meanings.sent4: The workpieces were like blank canvases waiting to be transformed.
meanings.sent5: The workpieces gleamed under the bright studio lights.

meanings.definition: The object being worked on in a manufacturing process
meanings.sent1: The factory workers assembled the workpieces to create the final product.
meanings.sent2: The machines efficiently processed the workpieces along the production line.
meanings.sent3: The workpieces in the factory had a dance party when the workers left for the day.
meanings.sent4: The workpieces moved through the factory like a river flowing downstream.
meanings.sent5: The quality control team inspected each workpiece with precision.
